  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>1006866.x-none</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Dr. Suono</string>
            <string language="en">Dr.Sound</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dr.Sound</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dr.Sound</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dr.Sound</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Δρ Sound</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dr.Sound</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Ora imparerete molto sull'uso del suono nel vostro computer. Questo corso è suddiviso in sette capitoli e copre le opzioni di cui puoi disporre su Windows senza uso di programmi aggiuntivi.</string>
            <string language="en">You are now going to learn a lot about the use ofsound on your computer.This course is divided into seven chaptersand covers the options available to you in Windowswithout using additional programs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">suono</string>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Dr. Suono</string>
            <string language="en">Dr.sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie werden jetzt über das Gebrauch ofsound auf 
Ihrem computer.This Kurs viel erlernen werden geteilt in sieben 
chaptersand Abdeckungen die Optionen, die für Sie in Windowswithout 
mit zusätzlichen Programmen vorhanden sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous allez maintenant vous renseigner beaucoup sur
l'ofsound d'utilisation sur votre cours de computer.This est divisé 
en sept couvertures de chaptersand les options disponibles à vous 
dans Windowswithout en utilisant des programmes supplémentaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você está indo agora aprender muito sobre o 
ofsound do uso em seu curso de computer.This é dividido em sete 
tampas do chaptersand as opções disponíveis a você em 
Windowswithout usando programas adicionais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόκειται τώρα να μάθετε πολύς για τη χρήση 
ofsound στον υπολογιστή σας Αυτή η σειρά μαθημάτων 
διαιρείται σε επτά καλύψεις chaptersand τις προαιρετικές 
δυνατότητες διαθέσιμες σε σας σε Windowswithout που 
χρησιμοποιείτε τα πρόσθετα προγράμματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usted ahora va a aprender mucho sobre el ofsound 
del uso en su curso de computer.This se divide en siete cubiertas del 
chaptersand las opciones disponibles para usted en Windowswithout 
usando programas adicionales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dr.sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bruit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dr.sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">som</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dr.sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ήχος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Dr.sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sonido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dr.sound</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
